sentences.en: Condense the mixture by boiling off some of the liquid.
sentences.cn: 通过煮沸,蒸发掉一些液体,使混合液浓缩.

sentences.en: Condense this paragraph into a few sentences.
sentences.cn: 把这段文字简缩成几个句子.

sentences.en: He managed to condense his. letter of application to one page.
sentences.cn: 他设法将申请信精简为一页纸.

sentences.en: Huge quantities of steam may be erupted and then condense.
sentences.cn: 大量水气会喷发出来,然后冷凝成雨.

sentences.en: I've tried to condense ten pages of comments into two.
sentences.cn: 我试图把十页长的评论文章缩短成两页.

sentences.en: One that condenses, especially an apparatus to condense vapor.
sentences.cn: '冷凝'.''器''.'冷凝'. ''器具, 尤指用于冷却气体的设备.

sentences.en: Package is the condense of market, the strongly means of marketing.
sentences.cn: 包装是市场的浓缩, 是强有力的营销手段.

sentences.en: Stars condense from the matter scattered thinly through interstellar space.
sentences.cn: 恒星是疏散在星际空间的物质凝聚而成的.

sentences.en: The essay is too wordy, you'd better condense it.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章太过冗长, 要简缩一下.

sentences.en: the mist which condensed on every cold surface
sentences.cn: 每个冰冷的表面上凝结的水汽

sentences.en: The tonofilaments condense into bundles and become attached to desmosomes.
sentences.cn: 张力细丝集中成束,并附着于桥粒上.

sentences.en: This causes more and more water vapour to condense.
sentences.cn: 这就使越来越多的水蒸气凝结.

sentences.en: This whole chapter could be condensed into a few paragraphs.
sentences.cn: 这一整章可以压缩成几个段落。

sentences.en: Use: Used to wash, condense and whiten the pulp.
sentences.cn: 用途: 适应于浆料的洗涤 、 浓缩和漂白.

sentences.en: Vapor or fumes may condense on piping, ducts, or stack walls.
sentences.cn: 蒸气或尘雾可能在管道, 烟道或烟囱壁上冷凝.

sentences.en: We have learnt how to condense serious messages into short, self-contained sentences.
sentences.cn: 我们已经学会了如何把重要的信息压缩成简短独立的句子。

sentences.en: We recounted in detail how dense, cool molecular clouds condense into protostars.
sentences.cn: 我们十分详细地讨论了浓密的冷分子云如何凝聚成原恒星.

words.tran_cn: 冷凝器；[电] 电容器；[光] 聚光器

trans.tran_en: to make something that is spoken or written shorter, by not giving as much detail or using fewer words to give the same information

trans.tran_cn: 使冷凝， 使凝结； 浓缩， 压缩， 简缩
trans.tran_en: if a gas condenses, or is condensed, it becomes a liquid
